channel.title: KevinCTofel tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from KevinCTofel.

item.description: ICYMI: This new Chrome OS 105 feature could boost Chromebook battery life https://t.co/rnhexWp1Ug https://t.co/solq2x7ioU
Found in the Dev Channel, this tweaked Chrome OS 105 feature could help boost Chromebook battery life. https://t.co/rnhexWp1Ug

Life of a Pixel: A tour of the internals of Chromium's rendering architecture, tracing the steps in the pipeline from web content to display pixels. https://t.co/1XU4rU7aox via @slicknet
Jetson One eVTOL: Watch the First Commute https://t.co/p0fuIkp1Re
Amazon to use walking, electric cargo bikes to replace thousands of van deliveries üëèüèº https://t.co/xdGgYWhddO

Just added $50 towards the project. Always happy to help in any small way to get more Chromebooks into schools. If anyone else can spare even just a few dollars, I know this classroom would appreciate it! https://t.co/F8nmbh5qX8
‚ÄúKnowing how depression works can help you better support loved ones who are struggling.‚Äù <‚Äî Excellent article to shed light on what depression feels like. https://t.co/7TqX12wX5S
‚ÄúIn many ways Rivian is a modern day Subaru who also likes to play with the outdoor crowd.‚Äù https://t.co/yfQju1MK36
I just sent the free, weekly About Chromebooks email newsletter to nearly 5,000 subscribers. Want to join them? Click the link to read this week‚Äôs newsletter and subscribe! https://t.co/DeBQyVfXDo
ICYMI: HP Elite Dragonfly Chromebook sale: Base model is $979.99 https://t.co/IwQdTAOIJW https://t.co/v3eIEWjHGc

@AlainLe89396509 Who marketed Chromebooks with a USP as ‚Äúlower price‚Äù, retailers? Maybe. But that isn‚Äôt, nor was it ever, a USP. In the beginning, you paid less because you had less capability and functionality. Chrome OS has always been about 3 S‚Äôs: Speed, Simplicity, Security. *That‚Äôs* the USP.
@AlainLe89396509 See the original demo and thoughts on the three S‚Äôs at the end of this: https://t.co/Z05f3fdIqT

@AlainLe89396509 Also for reference: The Windows version of the HP Elite Dragonfly is about $1,000 to $1,500 more than this HP Elite Dragonfly Chromebook. Mainly because they‚Äôre targeted at enterprise. https://t.co/3ukTTXS2J8

@AlainLe89396509 You can still buy a $200 - $300 (or less with sales) Chromebook. But these were never about ‚Äúbeing cheap‚Äù. That‚Äôs a myth based on the first Chromebooks using repurposed netbook hardware. Chrome OS devices also run Android apps and a full Linux install, so not all web based.

@AlainLe89396509 There are Chromebooks at nearly every budget / price point. And the internals of a Chromebook can be the same as a Windows laptop; parts cost the same, regardless of the operating system.
Today I noticed a base model HP Elite Dragonfly Chromebook sale price of $979.99 with delivery expected around the end of July. https://t.co/IwQdTAOIJW

@Angry_Staffer Is there really any true effort to kill the filibuster? There‚Äôs risk involved since the minority may gain a congressional majority but at this point, it seems that it‚Äôs the only way to get any forward movement.
Gotta protect that transverse V-Twin! Engine guards installed on the #motoguzzi https://t.co/JwCxDP58Jn
